title: Horror-Comedy â€˜Hold the Fortâ€™ Sells to North America, U.K., Germany, France, Spain, Portugal for Blue Finch (EXCLUSIVE)
description: U.K. sales and distribution company Blue Finch Films has closed a raft of international sales for horror-comedy â€œHold the Fort,â€ with Sunrise Films
body:
U.K. sales and distribution company Blue Finch Films has closed a raft of international sales for horror-comedy â€œHold the Fort,â€ with Sunrise Films picking up North American rights to the William Bagley-directed feature.

	Sunrise Films, whose recent slate includes Toronto Film Festival selection â€œSaipan,â€ starring Steve Coogan and Ã‰anna Hardwicke, has acquired the film for North America with plans for a summer release.


	The genre pic, which made its world premiere at Fantasia Film Festival before touring the festival circuit, has also been acquired by Signature Entertainment for the U.K. and Ireland. Additional deals have been struck with Lighthouse Home Entertainment for Germany, Mediawan Rights for France, Wild Duck Prods. for Spain and Vendetta Filmes for Portugal. Blue Finch Films said further sales are in the pipeline.
	

	The film centers on a couple, Lucas and Jenny, whose excitement over becoming first-time homeowners turns to terror when they discover their new property comes with deadly strings attached. Trapped in a conflict between their homeowners association and supernatural forces, the pair must fight for survival in what the filmmakers describe as a horror-comedy take on contemporary housing anxieties.

	Scott Hawkins created the story, with Bagley penning the screenplay. Bagley also produced alongside Matt Dodd and Luke Williams, both of whom previously collaborated with the director on â€œThe Murder Podcast.â€ Tim Reis (â€œThe Adult Swim Yule Logâ€) and Julian Smith round out the producing team.

	Blue Finch Filmsâ€™ current international slate includes Rotterdam-selected â€œBowels of Hell,â€ SXSW selection â€œImposters,â€ and horror title â€œDolly,â€ which IFC will release theatrically in March.

schema.headline: Horror-Comedy â€˜Hold the Fortâ€™ Sells to North America, U.K., Germany, France, Spain, Portugal for Blue Finch (EXCLUSIVE)

title: Animated Film â€˜Guardian Rabbitsâ€™ Joins Sola Media Slate at the European Film Market (EXCLUSIVE)
description: Sales company Sola Media has added CGI animated film â€œGuardian Rabbits â€” the Secret of the Golden Eggâ€ to its lineup at the European Film Market and
body:
Sales company Sola Media has added CGI animated film â€œGuardian Rabbits â€” the Secret of the Golden Eggâ€ to its lineup at the European Film Market and has released the first image from the film.

	â€œGuardian Rabbitsâ€ is the third installment in the â€œRabbitâ€ universe, following â€œRabbit Schoolâ€ and â€œRabbit Academy,â€ which both were sold to more than 180 territories. The latter was a box office hit with a $10.5 million gross worldwide and ranked third among the top German films abroad.
	

	The new film is directed by Ute von MÃ¼nchow Pohl, who also helmed â€œRabbit Academyâ€ and â€œRabbit School,â€ as well as â€œThe Super Elfkins,â€ â€œThe Elfkins â€” Baking a Differenceâ€ and â€œRaven the Little Rascal.â€


	All three â€œRabbitâ€ films are produced by Germanyâ€™s Akkord Film Produktion, which teams again with co-producers Arx Anima and Seru Animation, German distributor Leonine and Sola.

	In the new film, rabbit girl Emmy is chosen as the new Guardian of the Golden Egg â€” the magical source of Easter â€” but she doubts she can live up to the legacy. Her worries grow when a group of badgers takes over the Rabbit School and steals the Egg.

	On her rescue mission, she uncovers a hidden truth: the badgers are trying to save their dying ancient tree, the heart of their world. Faced with an impossible choice, Emmy unites rabbits, foxes and badgers, proving that the true magic of Easter is courage, unity and sharing its light with all.

	At the EFM, Sola will present exclusive first footage to buyers.

	â€œWe are thrilled to continue our collaboration with Akkord Film and to present â€˜Guardian Rabbitsâ€™ at the EFM in Berlin,â€ said Solveig Langeland, managing director of Sola. â€œWith a top animation team, new enchanting character designs and a compelling story, the film invites audiences back into our favorite rabbitsâ€™ universe. Buyers can look forward to a highly promising project filled with fun, action and heart.â€
	

	Currently in production and scheduled for delivery at the end of this year, â€œGuardian Rabbitsâ€ will be released in Germany around Easter 2027 by Leonine, one of Germanyâ€™s leading distributors.

schema.headline: Animated Film â€˜Guardian Rabbitsâ€™ Joins Sola Media Slate at the European Film Market (EXCLUSIVE)

title: Reese Witherspoon and Jennifer Garner Pay Tribute to James Van Der Beek: â€˜Such a Generous Personâ€™
description: On the red carpet for AppleTV+ series â€œThe Last Thing He Told Meâ€ Thursday evening, Reese Witherspoon and Jennifer Garner both had memories of James
body:
On the red carpet for AppleTV+ series â€œThe Last Thing He Told Meâ€ Thursday evening, Reese Witherspoon and Jennifer Garner both had memories of James Van Der Beek to share.

	Van Der Beek, who died Wednesday at 48, had one of his final roles in the â€œLegally Blondeâ€ prequel series â€œElle,â€ which Witherspoon is executive producing. It premieres July 1 on Amazon Prime.

	Varietyâ€˜s Marc Malkin asked Witherspoon on the carpet about working with the late â€œDawsonâ€™s Creekâ€ actor. â€œIt was so fun because, you know, growing up in this business, we always knew James,â€ Witherspoon said. â€œHe was always around. We went to parties together. Itâ€™s just a devastating loss.â€
	

	Witherspoon continued, â€œHeâ€™s been so loved in our community. He was always such a generous person and a man of very high character and high values. He brought that to everyday work on the set with our young cast. They just adored him.â€

	She wrote on Instagram Wednesday that she was â€œdevastatedâ€ and continued, â€œWhat an extraordinary, talented man who also showed great kindness and grace in every action. Praying all the angels watch over his family during this difficult time.â€

	Garner told Malkin, â€œWe grew up together. We celebrated their success, and James always brought his whole family into every room with him, and I just send all of my love to Kimberly and to their beautiful children.â€ 

	After Van Der Beekâ€™s death, Garner wrote â€œWhat a heartbreaking loss. So much love to you, Kimberly, and to your kids, as you navigate this tender time.â€

	Garner stars in and executive produces â€œThe Last Thing He Told Me,â€ which premieres its second season Feb. 20. Witherspoon executive produced the series through her Hello Sunshine shingle.

schema.headline: Reese Witherspoon and Jennifer Garner Pay Tribute to James Van Der Beek: â€˜Such a Generous Personâ€™

title: â€˜One Battle After Another,â€™ â€˜Wicked: For Goodâ€™ and â€˜Frankensteinâ€™ Lead Costume Designers Guild Award Winners
description: Colleen Atwood (â€œOne Battle After Anotherâ€), Paul Tazewell (â€œWicked: For Good)â€ and Kate Hawley (â€œFrankensteinâ€) were the big winners of the 28thÂ Co
body:
Colleen Atwood (â€œOne Battle After Anotherâ€), Paul Tazewell (â€œWicked: For Good)â€ and Kate Hawley (â€œFrankensteinâ€) were the big winners of the 28thÂ Costume Designers Guild AwardsÂ on Thursday evening.

	On the TV side, Kameron Lennox took home the award for her work on â€œThe Studio,â€ while Michael Wilkinson won for â€œAndor.â€


	For the first time in the history of the guild, there was a tie in the excellence in short form design category Rafaella Rabinovich won for â€œDandylandâ€ Episode 10 and Michelle Martini, CDG forâ€œUber Eats: A Century of Cravingsâ€ â€“ Super Bowl. 
	

	Hawley who won for excellence in period film for â€œFrankensteinâ€ thanked Guillermo del Toro and said, â€œI would have given up at certain times without himâ€¦ I love that he celebrates and supports all of us and the process of being an artist.â€

	Actor Courtney Hope who plays Sally Spectra on â€œThe Young and the Restlessâ€ and â€œThe Bold and the Beautifulâ€ hosted the evening, which celebrated special honorees Michelle Cole, James Cameron, Kate Hudson and Teyana Taylor.

	Taylor who received the Vanguard Spotlight Award said, â€œCostume Design has always been bigger than fashion. In my life, itâ€™s storytelling. Before a character ever speaks, what they wear is already telling you who they are, their strength, their vulnerability, their journey. That kind of visual language has inspired me since I was a little girl.â€ Taylor went on to say, â€œThis award represents creative freedom, the freedom to take risks, push boundaries and honor where I came from and just to continue to evolve to the next generation of creatives.â€
	

	Cole who is on the board, thanked the guildâ€™s president Terry Gordon and said, â€œThey are fighting for each and every one of you designers.â€

	Tazewell who won for excellence in sci-fi/fantasy for â€œWicked: For Goodâ€™ called his win a full circle moment. He said, â€œTo have experienced the journey that I experienced, creating the costumes, the looks for the world of â€˜Wickedâ€™ and â€˜Wicked: For Goodâ€™ has changed my life in so many profound ways.

	Hudson received the Spotlight Award, which honors an actor whose talent and career personify an enduring commitment to excellence, including a special awareness of the role and importance of costume design. While onstage accepting her award, Hudson recalled, how her earliest memories â€œare sitting on the floor of a studio in Hollywood surrounded by every sequence imaginable, looking down at me are these giants, my exquisite mother, and the phenomenal, iconic Bob Mackie designed for her, both in life and on film.â€ She added, â€œWatching that level of artistry as a child, it was magic.â€ She added she had hoped to work with everyone in the room and joked, â€œI promise Iâ€™m really fun to work with. Iâ€™m good at collaborating, and Iâ€™ll always take a note. You can say no, but I do continue to be in awe of what you do.â€Cole accepted the Career Achievement Award, which recognizes an individual whose career in costume design has left an indelible mark on film and television.

	The eveningâ€™s Distinguished Collaborator Award was presented to James Cameron by Deborah L. Scott. The award recognizes individuals whose exceptional skills and contributions have significantly advanced the craft and art of costume design. It highlights behind-the-scenes professionals whose dedication and expertise are essential to the storytelling process through costume design. 

	Cameron who has worked with Scott for over three decades recalled their time working on â€œTitanic.â€ He said, â€œDeborah had to clothe 2200 extras. So you can look at the task in terms of its scale; ,all of these costumes for the first class, second class, third class passengers and all the crew and so on. But I think that you can imagine the scale of that project, especially when all the costumes had to go in the water and come back out and still be usable, tuxedos and everything getting immersed night after night, because the Titanic itself sank once for a movie, we had to sink it over and over.â€ 

	Cameron ended his speech by saying, â€œThese awards and this community that celebrates the art of design is so critical in this Age of the onslaught of AI.â€ He added, â€œAI donâ€™t sew,â€
	

	See the full list of winners below.

	Excellence in Contemporary Filmâ€œBugoniaâ€ â€“ Jennifer Johnson, CDGâ€œF1 The Movieâ€ â€“ Julian Day, CDGâ€œOne Battle After Anotherâ€ â€“ Colleen Atwood, CDG (WINNER)â€œWake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mysteryâ€ â€“ Jenny Eagan, CDGâ€œWeaponsâ€ â€“ Trish Summerville, CDG

	Excellence in Period Filmâ€œDownton Abbey: The Grand Finaleâ€ â€“ Anna Mary Scott Robbinsâ€œFrankensteinâ€ â€“ Kate Hawley, CDG (WINNER)â€œHamnetâ€ â€“ Malgosia Turzanska, CDGâ€œHeddaâ€ â€“ Lindsay Pughâ€œSinnersâ€ â€“ Ruth E. Carter, CDGExcellence in Sci-Fi/Fantasy Filmâ€œAvatar: Fire and Ashâ€ â€“ Deborah L. Scott, CDGâ€œHow To Train Your Dragonâ€ â€“ Lindsay Pughâ€œThunderbolts*â€ â€“ Sanja Milkovic Hays, CDGâ€œTron: Aresâ€ â€“ Christine Bieselin Clark, CDG & Alix Friedberg, CDGâ€œWicked: For Goodâ€ â€“ Paul Tazewell, CDG (WINNER)

	Excellence in Contemporary Televisionâ€œEmily in Parisâ€ â€“ Veni, Vidi, Venezia â€“ Marylin Fitoussiâ€œHacksâ€ â€“ Heaven â€“ Kathleen Felix-Hager, CDGâ€œThe Righteous Gemstonesâ€ â€“ You Hurled Me Into the Depths, Into the Very Heartof the Seas â€“ Christina Flannery, CDGâ€œThe Studioâ€ â€“ CinemaCon â€“ Kameron Lennox, CDG (WINNER)â€œWednesdayâ€ â€“ Woe Me The Money â€“ Colleen Atwood, CDG & Mark SutherlandExcellence in Period Televisionâ€œ1923â€ â€“ A Dream and a Memory â€“ Janie Bryant, CDG & Gaby Acosta, CDGâ€œChief of Warâ€ â€“ City of Flowers â€“ Caroline Eselin-Schaefer, CDGâ€œHouse of Guinnessâ€ â€“ Episode 4 â€“ Edward K. Gibbonâ€œPalm Royaleâ€ â€“ Maxine Is Ready to Single Mingle â€“ Alix Friedberg, CDG &Leigh Bell, CDG (WINNER)â€œThe Gilded Ageâ€ â€“ Marriage Is a Gamble â€“ Kasia Walicka Maimone

	Excellence in Sci-Fi/Fantasy Televisionâ€œAndorâ€ â€“ Harvest â€“ Michael Wilkinson, CDG â€“ (WINNER)â€œBlack Mirrorâ€ â€“ USS Callister: Into Infinity â€“ Matthew Priceâ€œMurderbotâ€ â€“ FreeCommerce â€“ Carrie Grace, CDG & Laura Jean Shannon, CDGâ€œThe Wheel of Timeâ€ â€“ He Who Comes With The Dawn â€“ Sharon Gilhamâ€œThe Witcherâ€ â€“ Baptism of Fire â€“ Lucinda WrightExcellence in Variety, Reality-Competition, Live Televisionâ€œDancing with the Starsâ€ â€“ Premiere â€“ Steven Norman Lee, CDG & DanielaGschwendtner, CDGâ€œSaturday Night Live 50th Anniversary Specialâ€ â€“ Tom Broecker, CDG, CristinaNatividad, & Ashley Dudek  (WINNER)â€œThe Masked Singerâ€™ â€“ The Lucky 6: Merging of the Masks â€“ Steven Norman Lee,CDG & Luke Dâ€™Alessandro, CDGâ€œThe Traitorsâ€ â€“ Til Death Us Do Part â€“ Sam Spector, CDG & Rikki Finlayâ€œWicked: One Wonderful Nightâ€ â€“ Katja Cahill, CDGExcellence in Short Form Designâ€œSomedayâ€ by Spike Jonze: AirPods 4 â€“ Kym Barrett, CDGâ€œDandylandâ€ Episode 10 â€“ Rafaella Rabinovich â€“  (WINNER)â€œLady Gaga: The Dead Danceâ€ (Music Video) â€“ Colleen Atwood, CDGâ€œBatman vs. Bateman: State Farmâ€ â€“ Anette Cseri, CDGâ€œUber Eats: A Century of Cravingsâ€ â€“ Super Bowl â€“ Michelle Martini, CDG (WINNER)

	Excellence in Costume Illustrationâ€œOn Swift Horsesâ€ â€“ Eduardo Lucero, CDG Illustratorâ€œPalm Royaleâ€ â€“ Oksana Nedavniaya, CDG Illustratorâ€œSinnersâ€ â€“ Felipe Sanchez, CDG Illustrator (WINNER)â€œWeaponsâ€ â€“ Oksana Nedavniaya, CDG Illustrator

schema.headline: â€˜One Battle After Another,â€™ â€˜Wicked: For Goodâ€™ and â€˜Frankensteinâ€™ Lead Costume Designers Guild Award Winners

title: After AI Video of â€˜Tom Cruiseâ€™ Fighting â€˜Brad Pittâ€™ Goes Viral, Motion Picture Association Denounces â€˜Massiveâ€™ Infringement on Seedance 2.0
description: The Motion Picture Association on Thursday denounced the newest AI video generator, Seedance 2.0, saying it had unleashed a flood of copyright infri
body:
The Motion Picture Association on Thursday denounced the newest AI video generator, Seedance 2.0, saying it had unleashed a flood of copyright infringement in the day since it became available.

	ByteDance, the Chinese owner of TikTok, said the model represents a â€œsubstantial leap in generation qualityâ€ since the previous version. Videos generated by the service â€“ notably one of Tom Cruise and Brad Pitt fighting on a rooftop â€” have gone viral on social media platforms.
	

	â€œIn a single day, the Chinese AI service Seedance 2.0 has engaged in unauthorized use of U.S. copyrighted works on a massive scale,â€ an MPA spokesperson said in a statement. â€œBy launching a service that operates without meaningful safeguards against infringement, ByteDance is disregarding well-established copyright law that protects the rights of creators and underpins millions of American jobs. ByteDance should immediately cease its infringing activity.â€


	The trade association made a similar comment after OpenAI released Sora 2 last fall, which also generated a glut of AI-enabled copyright infringement.

	â€œOpenAI needs to take immediate and decisive action to address this issue,â€ the MPA said at the time. â€œWell-established copyright law safeguards the rights of creators and applies here.â€

	OpenAI was responsive to those concerns, implementing safeguards that made it much more difficult for users to violate studio copyrights. Disney later made a deal with OpenAI to license 200 characters for use on Sora 2, which was seen by many as a potential template for other studios to follow.
	

	But it is not clear whether ByteDance would be open to that approach, or whether copyright owners will be compelled to start filing takedown notices and infringement suits. The company did not immediately respond to a request for comment.

	Some reacted to the Seedance videos with doom and resignation.

	â€œI hate to say it. Itâ€™s likely over for us,â€ wrote Rhett Reese, writer of the â€œDeadpoolâ€ films, in a comment on the Cruise-Pitt video. â€œIn next to no time, one person is going to be able to sit at a computer and create a movie indistinguishable from what Hollywood now releases.â€

	The video was generated by Ruairi Robinson, an Irish film and commercial maker. 

	â€œThis was a 2 line prompt in seedance 2,â€ he wrote on X. â€œIf the hollywood is cooked guys are right maybe the hollywood is cooked guys are cooked too idk.â€

	In response to backlash over the video, he wrote: â€œTodayâ€™s question is: should i be killed for typing 2 lines and pressing a button.â€

	Other Seedance videos circulating online include riffs on â€œSpider Man,â€ â€œTitanic,â€ â€œStranger Things,â€ â€œLord of the Rings,â€ â€œShrek,â€ and more.

schema.headline: After AI Video of â€˜Tom Cruiseâ€™ Fighting â€˜Brad Pittâ€™ Goes Viral, Motion Picture Association Denounces â€˜Massiveâ€™ Infringement on Seedance 2.0

title: â€˜The Pushoverâ€™ Closes North America with MHZ Networks (EXCLUSIVE)
description: Brooding Nordic noir crime thriller â€œThe Pushoverâ€ has been bought for North America by MHZ Networks, in a deal negotiated with international distri
body:
Brooding Nordic noir crime thriller â€œThe Pushoverâ€ has been bought for North America by MHZ Networks, in a deal negotiated with international distributor Reinvent Yellow Sales.Â 

	In an upbeat rollout, â€œThe Pushover,â€ the second adaptation of a Lone Theils crime novel after hit â€œFatal Crossing,â€ has also closed Poland (NC+) and Benelux (Lumiere Group).

	Denmarkâ€™s DR and Swedenâ€™s TV4 pre-bought rights to the six-part â€œThe Pushover,â€ part of this yearâ€™s Berlinale Series Market Selects. Â 
	

	â€œThe Pushoverâ€ begins when a woman is found dead in her pool in Copenhagenâ€™s upscale Danish Riviera of North Zealand. Her boyfriend, it transpires, is a notorious con man, Tom, who claims the death was an accident. â€œThe Pushover,â€ like â€œFatal Crossing,â€ features hard-driving journalist Nora Sand (Marie SandÃ¸ Jondal), who investigates Tomâ€™s past in an attempt to prove the womanâ€™s death is murder. Â  Â  Â  Â  Â 


	â€œThe story feels authentic and grounded, driven by human flaws, moral ambiguity and quiet tension rather than flashy twists. It keeps you hooked until the very end, with an unpredictable conclusion you simply canâ€™t guess in advance,â€ said Helene AurÃ¸, at Reinvent Yellow.

	Produced by Shuuto Arctic for Norwegian streamer Altibox, â€œThe Pushoverâ€ reunites â€œFatal Crossingâ€ scribes Arne Berggren and Kristine Berg and helmer Magnus Berggren.

schema.headline: â€˜The Pushoverâ€™ Closes North America with MHZ Networks (EXCLUSIVE)

title: James Van Der Beekâ€™s Family Earns $2 Million After His Death as Friends Thank GoFundMe Donors: â€˜It Reminds Us That Love Is Realâ€™
description:
A GoFundMe campaign for James Van Der Beekâ€™s family has raised $2 million after his death at 48.

	Van Der Beek, who starred as Dawson Leery on the
body:
A GoFundMe campaign for James Van Der Beekâ€™s family has raised $2 million after his death at 48.

	Van Der Beek, who starred as Dawson Leery on the hit WB series â€œDawsonâ€™s Creek,â€ died on Feb. 11 following a battle with colorectal cancer. Shortly after the news broke, friends launched a GoFundMe to support his wife, Kimberly Van Der Beek, and their six children.

	â€œIn the wake of this loss, Kimberly and the children are facing an uncertain future. The costs of Jamesâ€™s medical care and the extended fight against cancer have left the family out of funds,â€ the message on the GoFundMe reads. â€œThey are working hard to stay in their home and to ensure the children can continue their education and maintain some stability during this incredibly difficult time. The support of friends, family, and the wider community will make a world of difference as they navigate the road ahead.â€
	

	The friends who created the page thanked fans on Feb. 12 for their donations, saying, â€œThank you from the bottom of our hearts for showing up for James and his beautiful family. Your kindness has meant more than we can put into words. In the middle of deep grief, your support has been a light. It reminds us that love is real, that community is strong, and that Jamesâ€™s spirit continues to bring people together.â€

	They added that the family is spending time together to mourn and asked for privacy. â€œYour respect and understanding will give them the room they need to heal,â€ the statement continues. â€œPlease continue to keep Jamesâ€™s wife and loved ones in your thoughts and prayers. Thank you for honoring his life with compassion, generosity, and love.â€
	

	Van Der Beek was diagnosed with colorectal cancer in 2023 and publicly shared his diagnosis the following year. In 2025, he partnered with Propstore to auction memorabilia from â€œDawsonâ€™s Creekâ€ to help cover the costs of his treatment. He later expanded the effort by selling jerseys from the 1999 film â€œVarsity Blues,â€ raising funds for his own medical costs and to help other â€œfamilies walking the same path.â€

schema.headline: James Van Der Beekâ€™s Family Earns $2 Million After His Death as Friends Thank GoFundMe Donors: â€˜It Reminds Us That Love Is Realâ€™

title: â€˜The Pete Davidson Showâ€™: SAG-AFTRA Signs Podcast Agreement With Netflix
description: Netflix has described its recently released â€œThe Pete Davidson Showâ€ as a â€œvideo podcastâ€ â€” and now SAG-AFTRA has signed an agreement with the strea
body:
Netflix has described its recently released â€œThe Pete Davidson Showâ€ as a â€œvideo podcastâ€ â€” and now SAG-AFTRA has signed an agreement with the streamer that covers the production as such.

	The talk show hosted by the â€œSaturday Night Liveâ€ alum, which debuted Jan. 30 on Netflix, sort of looks like a TV show. For one thing, itâ€™s available exclusively on Netflix, not widely distributed on major audio platforms like Apple Podcasts or Spotify as is typical for podcasts.
	

	After the Davidson show was announced, SAG-AFTRA reached out to Netflix to discuss whether the project should be treated as a TV show or a podcast. On Thursday, the actors union announced that it struck a podcast agreement. 


	â€œSAG-AFTRA and Netflix have executed a podcast agreement covering â€˜The Pete Davidson Show,'â€ a rep for the union said in a statement to Variety.

	The news comes as SAG-AFTRA on Monday (Feb. 9) commenced a round of bargaining on a new overall agreement with the Alliance of Motion Picture and Television ProducersÂ (AMPTP), of which Netflix is a member.

	SAG-AFTRA didnâ€™t disclose the terms of the podcast agreement with Netflix for the Davidson show. But typically the unionâ€™s podcast agreements have less stringent requirements than TV agreements do. Whereas TV contracts require payment of residuals, podcast contracts generally do not. In addition, TV contracts have relatively strict rules regarding a productionâ€™s safety protocols, working hours, breaks and travel, which are often simplified in podcast agreements.

	According to its FAQ on podcast contracts, the union says, â€œSAG-AFTRA negotiates term Podcast Agreements with podcast companies that have minimum rates and specific terms that may be different from our promulgated agreements. We also have contracts and relationships with broadcast shops and audiobook companies that produce podcasts.â€
	

	On â€œThe Pete Davidson Show,â€ the comedian sits down â€œwith his famous friends for revealing conversations from the comfort of his garage,â€ Netflix says. The guests on the first two episodes of the show are Machine Gun Kelly (MGK) and Charlamagne Tha God.

	The podcast is produced by Above Average president Marc Lieberman and Ayala Cohen (former head of  talent at â€œSNLâ€). Sarah Brennan Kolb directs. Separately, Davidson has made two comedy specials for Netflix: 2020â€™s â€œAlive From New Yorkâ€ and 2024â€™s â€œTurbo Fonzarelli.â€

	Netflix also has an original video podcast hosted by former NFL star Michael Irvin called â€œThe White House,â€ featuring sports analysis from a rotating roster of co-hosts including former pro football wide receiver Brandon Marshall. Currently SAG-AFTRA and Netflix do not have a podcast agreement covering this show.

schema.headline: â€˜The Pete Davidson Showâ€™: SAG-AFTRA Signs Podcast Agreement With Netflix

title: FBI Increases Nancy Guthrie Reward to $100,000 and Releases More Detailed Description of Kidnapping Suspect
description: The FBI announced on Thursday that it would increase the reward to $100,000 for information leading to the location of Nancy Guthrie or to the arres
body:
The FBI announced on Thursday that it would increase the reward to $100,000 for information leading to the location of Nancy Guthrie or to the arrest and conviction of anyone involved in her disappearance. 

	The agency also released new identifying details about a possible kidnapper, describing the suspect as â€œa male, approximately 5â€™9â€ â€“ 5â€™10â€ tall, with an average build. In the video, he is wearing a black, 25-liter â€˜Ozark Trail Hiker Packâ€™ backpack,â€ the Phoenix bureau of the FBI posted on X. 
	

	The bureau has received over 13,000 tips since Savannah Guthrieâ€˜s mother was reported missing on Feb. 1, and it said the description might help narrow down the tips. 


	The description was obtained from a forensic analysis of the Ring camera video from Guthrieâ€™s front door . On Tuesday, the FBI released the first images taken from the Ring camera, which showed a masked man with a backpack who was armed with a gun. The video appeared to be captured just before the camera was disabled. 

Today, the FBI is increasing its reward up to $100,000 for information leading to the location of Nancy Guthrie and/or the arrest and conviction of anyone involved in her disappearance.New identifying details about the suspect in the kidnapping of Nancy Guthrie have beenâ€¦ pic.twitter.com/GJcx4ra6wXâ€” FBI Phoenix (@FBIPhoenix) February 12, 2026


	Nancy Guthrie was reported missing on Feb. 1, and the Pima County Sheriffâ€™s Department declared her disappearance a crime on Feb. 2. Sheriff Chris Nanos said that he believed Nancy Guthrie did not leave her house â€œon her ownâ€ after investigators found â€œconcerningâ€ evidence at her Arizona residence.

	Also on Tuesday, the Pima County Sheriffâ€™s Department told ABC News that a person had been detained for questioning in connection with the case and that authorities were preparing a search of a location in relation to the detainee. However, that person was later released. 
	

	Patel wrote with the release of the photos, â€œWorking with our partners â€“ as of this morning, law enforcement has uncovered these previously inaccessible new images showing an armed individual appearing to have tampered with the camera at Nancy Guthrieâ€™s front door the morning of her disappearance.â€

	Savannah Guthrie on Monday posted a video to her Instagram begging for the publicâ€™s help in recovering her mother. 

	â€œWe believe our mom is still out there,â€ Savannah Guthrie said in the video. â€œWe need your help. Law enforcement is working tirelessly around the clock trying to bring her home â€” trying to find her. She was taken and we donâ€™t know where. And we need your help.â€

	She continued, â€œSo Iâ€™m coming on just to ask you not just for your prayers, but no matter where you are â€” even if youâ€™re far from Tucson. If you see anything, if you hear anything, if thereâ€™s anything at all that seems strange to you â€” that you report to law enforcement. We are at an hour of desperation, and we need your help.â€

schema.headline: FBI Increases Nancy Guthrie Reward to $100,000 and Releases More Detailed Description of Kidnapping Suspect

title: New â€˜God of Warâ€™ Game â€˜Sons of Spartaâ€™ Surprise Launches on PlayStation, Original Trilogy Remake in the Works
description: A new â€œGod of Warâ€ game titled â€œSons of Spartaâ€ surprise launched for the PS5 on Thursday, just as PlayStation revealed a remake of the original â€œGo
body:
A new â€œGod of Warâ€ game titled â€œSons of Spartaâ€ surprise launched for the PS5 on Thursday, just as PlayStation revealed a remake of the original â€œGod of Warâ€ trilogy is in the works.

	Per a blog post shared by â€œGod of Warâ€ developer Santa Monica Studio, â€œOver two decades ago in March 2005, God of War came out on the PlayStation 2 â€“ marking the beginning of Kratosâ€™ incredible journey through ancient Greece and beyond.Â As we approach the final month of God of Warâ€™s 20thÂ anniversary year in March 2026, we couldnâ€™t let this milestone close without giving fans one last big surprise!Â Weâ€™re thrilled to confirm that the original God of War trilogy is being remade â€“ and what better way to announce it than with the legendary TC Carson who brought Kratos to life in the Greek saga!â€
	

	Additionally, PlayStation has launched â€œGod of War: Sons of Sparta,â€ a 2D action platformer from Mega Cat Studios made in partnership with the writing team at Santa Monica Studio that worked on â€œGod of Warâ€ (2018) and â€œGod of War: RagnarÃ¶k.â€ Available now on PlayStation, the game include â€œa canon story set in Kratosâ€™ youth during his harsh training at the Agoge alongside his brother Deimos.â€


	The announcements were made by TC Carson (the voice actor for Kratos in the original â€œGod of Warâ€ games) during PlayStationâ€™s State of Play event Thursday.

	New game â€œSons of Spartaâ€ features Carson reprising his role as the adult version of Kratos to narrate the story.

	Watch the teaser for the â€œGod of Warâ€ trilogy remake below.

schema.headline: New â€˜God of Warâ€™ Game â€˜Sons of Spartaâ€™ Surprise Launches on PlayStation, Original Trilogy Remake in the Works

title: 'RHONY' Reunion Show Not Replacing Jill Zarin After Firing
description:
'Real Housewives of New York'
                          No Plans to Replace Jill Zarin After Axe
body:
'Real Housewives of New York'
                          No Plans to Replace Jill Zarin After Axe
                      
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                  
      
    
          Jill Zarin is out at the 'RHONY' reunion show "The Golden Life," but producers aren't looking to fill her big shoes, at least as of now ... TMZ has learned.
      
    
          Multiple sources with direct knowledge tell TMZ ... producers currently have no plans to replace Jill on the E! series after she was fired this week over her controversial statements about Bad Bunny's Super Bowl halftime performance, which many people found to be racist.
      
    
      
      Jill Zarinâ€™s review of Bad Bunnyâ€™s #SuperBowl Halftime Showâ€¦ ğŸ¥´ pic.twitter.com/XH8f0HjQpIâ€” Gibson Johns (@gibsonoma) February 9, 2026
              @gibsonoma
          
  
    
          We're told the show's producers feel the remaining women are more than capable of carrying the show and don't need anyone else to take over Jill's spot.
      
    
          Our sources also tell us fans could still see familiar faces from past RHONY seasons because there's chatter about cameos during filming. Speaking of former cast members, Dorinda Medley has just joined the reunion show ... but not as a full-time cast member, as of now.
      

                  
          
                          
                
                  
      
    
          As we reported, Blink49 Studios cut ties with Jill on Tuesday after she posted and then deleted an Instagram video on Sunday criticizing Bad Bunny's Super Bowl Halftime Show. The clip, later reposted on X, sparked backlash and ultimately led to her termination from the E! project.
      
    
          Sources close to Jill told us she believes she was punished for expressing an opinion, especially when other Housewives have weathered controversies without losing their roles. Our sources tell us she quickly deleted the video after realizing she misspoke and, after rewatching the performance, came to better understand its cultural significance.
      
    
          We reached out to reps for E! ... so far, no word back.
      
      
              
            
              Related articles
            
        
              
          
                          
                Jill Zarin

title: Second Nancy Guthrie Demand Note, Last Chance To Pay For Kidnapper's Identity
description:
Nancy Guthrie
                          New Bitcoin Demand To ID Kidnapper
body:
Nancy Guthrie
                          New Bitcoin Demand To ID Kidnapper
                      
                  
                                                                        Published 
                              
                February 12, 2026
                
                            10:37 AM PST
                                                                      |
                                                                Updated 
                                  February 12, 2026
                                7:13 PM PST
                                    
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                                  
      
    
          TMZ has received another email from the person who claims to know the identity of Nancy Guthrie's kidnapper ... and the words are chilling.
      
    
          As we reported, TMZ received an email Wednesday, asking for 1 bitcoin in return for the name of the kidnapper. A single bitcoin is currently worth around $65,000. We monitored the account all day, but nothing was deposited.
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                                  
      
    
          Just after 8 AM Pacific Time Thursday ... TMZ received a second email from the same person, who complained, "I am not being taken seriously." He makes some ominous statements in the email ... TMZ is cooperating with law enforcement by not disclosing specifics. One thing he makes clear ... the situation has changed from Wednesday to Thursday.
      
    
          As for why he wants a bitcoin ... he says he will need money to lay low after identifying the kidnapper for fear of retaliation. He also worries he might be "incriminated like that Carlos [the deliveryman who was detained and released] guy."
      
    
      
        
                    
                  
      
                    TMZ.com
          
    
          He ends by saying this is his final attempt to help.
      
    
      
        
                    
                  
      
                    TMZ.com
          
    
          As of this post, no money or bitcoin has been deposited in his account.
      
      
              
            
              Related articles

schema.headline: Second Nancy Guthrie Demand Note, Last Chance To Pay For Kidnapper's Identity
